mapper.sql: t_end_user . id , t_end_user.avatar, t_end_user.account, t_end_user.password, t_end_user.salt, t_end_user.name, t_end_user.dob, t_end_user.gender, t_end_user.email, t_end_user.phone, t_end_user.invite_code AS inviteCode, t_end_user.invitor_id AS invitorId, t_end_user.status, t_end_user.team_count AS teamCount, t_end_user.create_time AS createTime, t_end_user.version, t_end_user.delete_flag AS deleteFlag, t_end_user.registered_github_username AS registeredGithubUsername, t_end_user.registered_phone AS registeredPhone, t_end_user.registered_email AS registeredEmail, t_end_user.email_validated AS emailValidated, t_end_user.phone_validated AS phoneValidated, t_end_user.org_id AS orgId, t_end_user.tag, t_end_user.category_tag AS categoryTag, t_end_user.is_compere AS isCompere, t_end_user.is_register AS isRegister, t_end_user.type, t_end_user.sys_user_id AS sysUserId, t_end_user.vendor,t_end_user.end_login_time As endLoginTime

SELECT children.id FROM t_sys_org, t_sys_org as children WHERE t_sys_org.left_num <= children.left_num AND t_sys_org.right_num >= children.left_num and t_sys_org.id = #{record.orgId} order by t_sys_org.node_level ASC
mapper.select: SELECT t_end_user.* FROM t_end_user WHERE t_end_user.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_end_user.id

SELECT
FROM t_end_user LEFT JOIN sys_third_party_user ON sys_third_party_user.user_id = t_end_user.id
,() AS ownedOrgIds
WHERE 1=1
AND t_end_user.org_id = ownedOrgIds.id
AND t_end_user.id = #{record.id}
AND t_end_user.avatar LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.avatar},'%')
AND t_end_user.account LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.account},'%')
AND t_end_user.password LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.password},'%')
AND t_end_user.salt LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.salt},'%')
AND t_end_user.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.name},'%')
AND t_end_user.dob LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.dob},'%')
AND t_end_user.gender LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.gender},'%')
AND t_end_user.email LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.email},'%')
AND t_end_user.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.phone},'%')
AND t_end_user.invite_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.inviteCode},'%')
AND t_end_user.invitor_id = #{record.invitorId}
AND t_end_user.status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.status},'%')
AND t_end_user.team_count LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.teamCount},'%')
AND t_end_user.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createTime},'%')
AND t_end_user.end_login_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.endLoginTime},'%')
AND t_end_user.version LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.version},'%')
AND t_end_user.delete_flag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.deleteFlag},'%')
AND t_end_user.registered_github_username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.registeredGithubUsername},'%')
AND t_end_user.registered_phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.registeredPhone},'%')
AND t_end_user.registered_email LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.registeredEmail},'%')
AND t_end_user.email_validated LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.emailValidated},'%')
AND t_end_user.phone_validated LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.phoneValidated},'%')
AND t_end_user.org_id IN ()
AND t_end_user.tag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.tag},'%')
AND t_end_user.category_tag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.categoryTag},'%')
AND t_end_user.is_compere LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.isCompere},'%')
AND t_end_user.is_register LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.isRegister},'%')
AND t_end_user.type & #{record.type}
AND t_end_user.sys_user_id =#{record.sysUserId}
AND t_end_user.vendor LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.vendor},'%')
AND t_end_user.appid=#{record.appid}
AND t_end_user.appid in
#{item}
AND t_end_user.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_end_user.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
AND ( t_end_user.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_end_user.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR sys_third_party_user.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') )
GROUP BY t_end_user.id ORDER BY t_end_user.end_login_time DESC,t_end_user.create_time DESC

SELECT
FROM t_end_user LEFT JOIN sys_third_party_user ON sys_third_party_user.user_id = t_end_user.id WHERE 1=1 AND t_end_user.appid in ("1","2","3")
AND ( t_end_user.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_end_user.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR sys_third_party_user.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') )
GROUP BY t_end_user.id ORDER BY t_end_user.end_login_time DESC,t_end_user.create_time DESC
